cmdList: cat filename : display content of file
ls : list all files on the current folder
pwd : print name of current directory
rot : replaces all letters of a string with the Xth letter after it

mail.title: Welcome
mail.text: Welcome to 42 ! We hope you'll enjoy staying with us.

mail.title: SUPER DISCOUNT !!
mail.text: Come back now and get a -30% discount !

mail.title: Birthday Party
mail.text:
You're invited to my 18th b-day party, Monday 12th of December at MY PLACE !
I hope you'll be able make it !
PARTY ON ✿♥‿♥✿

social.title: Need help
social.text:
Sweetheart, when are you coming home ?
I need your help to fix my computer.
Call me.
Mom

mail.title: Holidays
mail.text:
Victor,
As I told you before, I am leaving for a two weeks seminar in Boston.
I leave you in charge, so you are responsible for the server status during the day.
Nigel will monitor it at night.
Do NOT contact me unless it is very important.
Regards.

mail.title: More work
mail.text:
I head you'll be in charge of the server at night. Good luck with that !
I hate it when the boss leaves...

mail.title: Walk
mail.text:
Hello Sarah, I was thinking, since you also have a dog, we should walk them together, what do you think ?
How about thursday ?
Laddie would be thrilled to meet your little Buddy. Let me know,
Victor

mail.title: Power Outage
mail.text: There will be a power outage next week at 3 A.M in the east wing (building J).

exchange.q: Hey, it's been a long time. I changed your computer login and password to 'root'. Try to log in terminal.
Once you're done, contact Zero, I heard she wants to talk to you.
s: You can get access to your computer using root/root.

cmdList: cat filename : display content of file
ls : list all files on the current folder
pwd : print name of current directory

exchange.q: Haha, good one. Like you'd forget your best friend ! (/ω＼)
r: You want to talk to me ?

exchange.q: I'm gonna give you a secret mission. I left a file just for you in your computer. Just open it.
Eaaasy ! Use 'help' in the terminal to see the available commands. Byyyye ! (⌒.－)＝★
